Title: Enacts the clean energy investment act of 2019
Summary: Enacts the clean energy investment act of 2019 to promote energy efficiency, energy conservation and the installation of clean energy technologies; reduce energy consumption and energy costs; reduce greenhouse gas emissions; support sustainable community development; and create local New York job opportunities in the energy fields of tomorrow.
LawCode: Amd ยง1854, Pub Auth L; amd ยง19-0301, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to emission allowance programs
